programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A serial predator targets men at gay bars, leaving a trail of dead bodies along the southeastern United States. Cops struggle to play catch up, until the perpetrator leaves behind a key piece of evidence at a crime scene.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: The disappearance of a wealthy retiree in South Florida quickly turns from a missing person's case to a full blown homicide investigation focused around an unexpected perpetrator and her convoluted plan to get away with murder.

programme.desc: The "Beast of Ukraine" kills more than 52 people; a hotshot broker gets tips on a promising experimental Alzheimer's drug.
